articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump sexually abused writer E. Jean Carroll, must pay her $5 million, jury says
articles.description: Carroll, 79, testified during the civil trial that Trump, 76, raped her in a Bergdorf Goodman department store dressing room in Manhattan in either 1995 or 1996, then harmed her reputation by writing in an October 2022 post on his Truth Social platform that her claims were a "complete con job," "a hoax" and "a lie." Trump was absent throughout the trial which began on April 25.
articles.content: Donald Trump must pay $5 million in damages for sexually abusing magazine writer E. Jean Carroll in the 1990s and then defaming her by branding her a liar, a jury decided on Tuesday. "Today, the world finally knows the truth," Carroll said in a state... [6026 chars]
